name: Cape Air Flight from Boston to Bar Harbor
description:
Cape Air is one of America’s most interesting airlines. And on this Cape Air flight, we flew from Boston to Bar Harbor in a Cessna 420. The nine-passenger airplane is perfect for the mission Cape Air gives it, flying short connections between major cities and smaller, more rural outposts. 

In this video, you'll see what it's on a Cape Air Flight and understand what makes Cape Air so special. 

You'll see the seats, the (lack of) inflight entertainment, and the spectacular views along the New England coastline. 

0:00 Introduction 
1:57 Checking into Cape Air 
4:37 Boarding Cape Air 
5:35 Cape Air Takeoff 
7:22 Cape Air Route Network 
9:05 Cape Air Landing 

Here’s a link to Cape Air’s Baggage Information:
https://www.capeair.com/flying_with_us/baggage.html
